articles.content:
Tonight, the Astros took the first game of the 3-game series in Anaheim, seemingly snatching defeat from the jaws of victory, but then turning around and immediately snatching victory right back. 
B… [+3036 chars]

articles.author: Zach Crizer
articles.title: MLB trade rumors feeling dull? We need a new way of thinking about the drama of baseball's deadline deals - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Baseball is a highly sophisticated industry in 2022. Is it making the trade deadline less entertaining?
articles.content: I have a friend who is a Texas Rangers fan. He doesnt nerd out on advanced stats or read prospect rankings or follow them religiously. He just checks the score and keeps tabs on whether they are good… [+12943 chars]
